data.text: @ThaigerNews Most countries have lifted restrictions & test requirements in the West and we are fine. The numbers dropped hugely thanks to vaccination. Yes there are still deaths, as from other viruses or diseases. Life must go on. And there are much more serious threats to worry about atm.

@ThaigerNews True, it's totally unclear but seriously why should all this matter anymore. Are we going to keep reporting numbers for years to come and be afraid of something that's a minor cold for most people. Would be understandable if we had a new dangerous variant but Omicron🤔
